{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Eeyelog |model=Epoc Mini |revision= |manuf= |manuf_model= |availability= |type=mobile NAS |fcc_id=Q58W001 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196CS |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=SD Card,USB 2.0 |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |serial= |jtag= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8188RE |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |flags=battery |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ch= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }}[http://www.eeyelog.com/en/product_view.asp?cid=108&eid=126 Product page]
aka '''W001''' Per the FCC manual..
SSID: Epoc-XXXXXX
Password: 88888888 This device is configurable via an iPad / iPhone app. "W001_MIANPCB_V3" is silkscreened on the breakout module in the FCC internal photos. "EBA6831A9C10000" is silkscreened on the router module in the FCC internal photos. "CPR916AG" is visible on a label on the router module in the FCC internal photos. [http://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/epoc-mini/id542276072?mt=8 Epoc Mini iPad app] 74:72:F2:07:23:FF may be the MAC address of the FCC EUT ([http://www.chipsip.com/ CHIPSIP OUI])
